name: Action Fubuki
storyline:
You are Fubuki GORO. You have been trained since your childhood in order to become a deadly kunoichi of the GORO clan.
You are employed by the government in the Special Action Agency SAA. They send you anywhere they need to elimainate a threat to the government.

Today, you have a new mission:
Eliminate Elon DUSK, the CEO of EXE company. He is leading some dangerous experimentation on humans, modifying the DNA in order to create super soldiers.
The government has asked multiple time to stop and close the facility but DUSK want to go further and further to the end of his objective.

Therefore, the government has no hope and order the SAA to eliminate DUSK and all the dangerous persons you will encounter in the facility.

The facility is positioned in a place unknown but we know that you will find it!
summary: Action Fubuki is a beat'em'up with a fast paced gameplay. You are Fubuki Goro, a kunoichi which use both martial techniques and special techniques to fight. The game is accessible to all as it require only a keyboard and a mouse.
